short.ja: Ethereumのブラウザ・エクステンション
short.th: ส่วนขยายเบราว์เซอร์สำหรับอีเธอเรียม
short.vi: Tính năng Ethereum cho trình duyệt
short.zh_TW: 乙太坊瀏覽器擴充插件

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JustLiquidity's #Binance Smart Chain & #Ethereum Browser Extension :

The JustLiquidity wallet is our way of making the user experience even more streamlined. It has the ability to interact with various distributed apps, from your web browser itself. Users can approve payments for dApp related purchases and services, send and receive funds, and monitor their tokens.

Your funds are completely secure when you use our wallet extension to create or manage wallet accounts. Some other interesting advantages of our offering are :
  1. View BEP20 & ERC20 token balances
  2. Interact with smart contracts
  3. Make token transactions to other addresses
  4. Connect with hardware wallets like Ledger and Trezor

In order to support the Binance Smart Chain Developers, we have also added the Binance Smart Chain Test Network.

The JustLiquidity wallet is a customized service, built originally using a forked version of the Nifty Extension. It has evolved a great deal and can even manage smart contract operations now, like multi-signature wallet operations.
